statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE risk_assessment_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE risk_assessment_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policy WHERE risk_assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;

SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount, risk_assessment_score FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC, risk_assessment_score DESC;

SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE risk_assessment_score < 50 AND premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC, premium_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%John%' OR policy_holder_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY risk_assessment_score DESC, policy_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT assessment_id, policy_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM insurance_policies GROUP BY policy_holder;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_start_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 100
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, policy_start_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_by, assessment_date, conclusion FROM risk_assessment WHERE conclusion LIKE '%high%'
SELECT policy_holder, risk_score FROM insurance_policies JOIN risk_assessment ON insurance_policies.policy_id = risk_assessment.policy_id
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, age, occupation FROM policy_applicants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments WHERE risk_score >= 80 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT applicant_name, age, occupation FROM policy_applicants WHERE age > 30

SELECT ip.policy_holder_name, pa.applicant_name, ra.risk_score FROM insurance_policies ip JOIN policy_applicants pa ON ip.policy_id = pa.applicant_id JOIN risk_assessments ra ON ip.policy_id = ra.policy_id
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments WHERE risk_score >= 80 ORDER BY risk_score ASC
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, age, address FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors WHERE LENGTH(factor_description) > 50;
SELECT policy_id, factor_id, risk_score FROM policy_risks ORDER BY risk_score DESC, policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM policyholders WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT policy_number, start_date, premium_amount FROM policies WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT p.policy_number, r.factor_name, r.factor_description FROM policies p JOIN policy_risks pr ON p.policy_id = pr.policy_id JOIN risk_factors r ON pr.factor_id = r.factor_id WHERE pr.risk_score > 5
SELECT * FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies p ON ph.id = p.policy_id WHERE p.end_date > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, start_date, end_date FROM Policies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2010;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, c.coverage_type, v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model FROM PolicyHolders p JOIN Policies c ON p.policy_holder_id = c.policy_holder_id JOIN Vehicles v ON c.policy_id = v.policy_id;
SELECT ph.first_name, ph.last_name, COUNT(cl.claim_id) AS total_claims FROM PolicyHolders ph LEFT JOIN Claims cl ON ph.policy_holder_id = cl.policy_id GROUP BY ph.first_name, ph.last_name;
SELECT p.coverage_type, r.assessment_date, ROUND(r.risk_score, 2) AS rounded_risk_score FROM Policies p JOIN RiskAssessments r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id ORDER BY r.assessment_date DESC;
